DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , crossover , randomize , single dose , three treatment , three period six sequence , single dosage , balance study determine Bioequivalence Isotretinoin . Bioequivalence compare reference medication one ( T1 ) vs test medication ( T3 ) : ( T1 v T3 ) ; reference medication two ( T2 ) , vs test medication ( T3 ) : ( T2 v T3 ) . Finally , treatment T1 v T2 compare statistically determine bioequivalent .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Determine Bioequivalence Isotretinoin Healthy Male Subjects Under Fed Condition
DOC.criteria: Included study male volunteer . Ages 18 45 year old . BMI ( Body Mass Index ) 20 26 kilogram/meter square ( kg/m^2 ) . Antidoping test negative result . Negative test result Ac human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) , HBsAg ( hepatitis B surface antigen ) , rapid plasma regain ( RPR ; syphilis test ) . Clinical biochemical test value : Hematic Biometry , Urine Analysis , Biochemical Profile : ( Glucose , Ureic Nitrogen , Urea , Creatinine , Uric Acid , Cholesterol , Triglycerides , Total Proteins , Albumin , Globulin , Bilirubin ( total , indirect direct ) , Alkaline Phosphatase ( ALP ) , Lactic Dehydrogenase , Asparate aminotransferase ( AST ) , Alanine aminotransferase ( ALT ) , Calcium , Phosphorus , Sodium , Potassium , Chlorine Iron ) , Ac HIV , HBsAg RPR , must fall within interval minimum maximum value connection say test accept value . Normal Electrocardiogram ( ECG ) Chest Xrays . Complete scale 'Columbia Suicide Severity Rating Scale ' ( CSSRS ) , dosification period . Obtain grade zero CSSRS . Signed Informed Consent correspond bioequivalence study .
